projects.title: Kotlin Calculator

projects.title: StayKeto - Master‚Äôs Project
projects.description: StayKeto is a web application I am designing to help users track whether they are in ketosis and visualize their progress. It is focused on people following the ketogenic diet and wanting to monitor their metabolic state, diet, and personal metrics (weight, measurements, etc.).
